44  static int get_16bit_value(unsigned int low, unsigned int high)
45  {
46 
47 
48  int value;
49  long temp;
50 
51  temp = (high << 8) | low;
52  if (temp > 32768) temp -= 65536;
53  value = static_cast <int> (temp);
54  return value;
55  }
56 
57 
64  static float convert(int value, int range)
65  {
66 
67  return value / 32768.0 * range;
68  }
69 };

216  void calibrate(int rounds)
217  {
218  float axsum = 0.0f, aysum = 0.0f, azsum = 0.0f;
219  float axoffset = 0.0f, ayoffset = 0.0f, azoffset = 0.0f;
220 
221  std::cout << "Keep accelerometer according to ax = 0 ay = 0 az = 1" << std::endl;
222 
223  for (int i; i < rounds; i++)
224  {
225  get_binary_data();
226  get_sample();
227 
228  std::cout << "ax = " << ax << " ay = " << ay << " az = " << az << endl;
229 
230  axsum += ax;
231  aysum += ay;
232  azsum += az;
233  usleep(25000);
234  }
235  axoffset = axsum / rounds;
236  ayoffset = aysum / rounds;
237  azoffset = azsum / rounds - 1;
238  }
239 };

448 
455  void calibrate(int rounds)
456  {
457  float mxmax = -32768.0f, mymax = -32768.0f, mzmax = -32768.0f;
458  float mxmin = 32767.0f, mymin = 32767.0f, mzmin = 32767.0f;
459  float mxoffset = 0.0f, myoffset = 0.0f, mzoffset = 0.0f;
460  float mxscale = 0.0f, myscale = 0.0f, mzscale = 0.0f;
461  float chordx = 0.0f, chordy = 0.0f, chordz = 0.0f;
462  float chord_average = 0.0f;
463 
464  std::cout << "Rotate compass" << std::endl;
465 
466  for (int i = 0; i < rounds; i++)
467  {
468  get_binary_data();
469  get_sample();
470 
471  std::cout << "mx = " << mx << " my = " << my << " mz = " << mz << std::endl;
472 
473  mxmin = min(mxmin, mx);
474  mymin = min(mymin, my);
475  mzmin = min(mzmin, mz);
476 
477  mxmax = max(mxmax, mx);
478  mymax = max(mymax, my);
479  mzmax = max(mzmax, mz);
480  }
481  mxoffset = (mxmax + mxmin) / 2.0f;
482  myoffset = (mymax + mymin) / 2.0f;
483  mzoffset = (mzmax + mzmin) / 2.0f;
484 
485  chordx = (mxmax - mxmin) / 2.0f;
486  chordy = (mymax - mymin) / 2.0f;
487  chordz = (mzmax - mzmin) / 2.0f;
488 
489  chord_average = (chordx + chordy + chordz) / 3;
490 
491  mxscale = chord_average / chordx;
492  myscale = chord_average / chordy;
493  mzscale = chord_average / chordz;
494  }
495 };

502 class Barometer : public Sensor
503 {
504  protected:

506  double Pressure;
507 
508 
513  void setP(double Pressure)
514  {
515  this->Pressure = Pressure;
516  }
517 
518  public:
519 
520 
524  Barometer()
525  {
526  this->Pressure = 0;
527  }
528 
529 
534  double getP()
535  {
536  return this->Pressure;
537  }
538 
539 
544  float getDepth()
545  {
546  return static_cast<float>(getP() - 101325) / (9.80665 * 997);
547  }
548 
549 
554  float getAltitude()
555  {
556  return static_cast<float>(1 - pow((getP() / 101325), .190295) * 145366.45 * .3048);
557  }
558 };
